Week 2 roundup

The robot

This week we have finished building the robot, and added a touch and optical sensor. We have also tested the optical and infra-red sensors stopping the robot from crashing into walls. The optical sensor has allowed us to react to detection of any of a selection of colours.

We have also experimented with playing sounds, both from the EV3 library and our own custom mp3 tracks. Along with this, we succeeded in displaying data on the display screen located on the brick of the robot.

We have also decided on our game as a maze, in which the robot has to navigate, and react with various objects. This approach allows us to have a reasonable amount of modularity for new obstacles in the maze.
